title: News
data:
This page details the news articles that have been released over time on the Crawl development blog, which can be found here: [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/blog]

===2023===
*May 22nd: [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-30-tournament-results 0.30 Tournament Results]
*May 5th: [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-30-the-reavers-return 0.30 "The Reavers Return"]
*April 1st: [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/trunk-updates-1-april-2023-and-tournament-announcement Trunk Updates 1 April 2023 and Tournament Announcement]
*January 11th: [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/trunk-updates-11-jan-2023 Trunk Updates 11 Jan 2023]

===2012===
* 5th November 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-11-tournament-results 0.11 Tournament Results!] (The wiki team came in a respectable fourth place, woo!)
* 10th October 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-11-tournament 0.11 Tournament]
* 2nd October 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/crawl-0-11-arachnophobia Crawl 0.11: "Arachnophobia"]
* 21st August 2012 - New US server: [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/cszo-announcement crawl.s-z.org]
* 13th August 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/cao-downtime CAO Downtime]
* 12th April 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-10-2 0.10.2] Maintenance Update
* 15th March 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/tournament-results 0.10 Tournament] Results!
* 23rd February 2012 - Stone Soup [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/survey Survey]
* 16th February 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/crawl-0-10-octopus Crawl 0.10]: “Save the Pacific Northwest Tree Octopus”
* 11th February 2012 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-10-tournament 0.9.2] bugfix release and 0.10 tournament!
===2011===
* 4th September 2011 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-9-1-bugfix-release 0.9.1] bugfix release.
* 1st September 2011 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/osx-builds-back-on-track OSX Builds] back on Track!
* 1st September 2011 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/august-2011-tournament-summary Summary] of the August 2011 tournament.
* 19th August 2011 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/webtiles-at-0-9-finally WebTiles] has been updated to Crawl v0.9.
* 15th August 2011 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/crawl-0-9-victory-valedictory Crawl 0.9: Victory Valedictory has been released!] Big skill training changes.
* 13th August 2011 - The official tournament has started! It ends on August 29, 2011 at midnight UTC. Check [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney11/index.html this page] for more information.
* 13th May 2011 - The Tiles version of Dungeon Crawl can now be played in your Internet browser! See [[Web Tiles]].
* 12th May 2011 - An (un)official [[Tournament|Crawl 0.8 Tournament]] starts on May 14th to celebrate the release of v0.8! Plays until May 30, 2011 at midnight UTC.
* 27th April 2011 - [http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/faster-pussycats-kill-kill Dungeon Crawl 0.8 has been released, with felids!]
===2010===
* 16th December 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/tavern/ The Dungeon Crawl forum is now hosted on CDO.]
* 24th November 2010 - [http://dungeoncrawlstonesoup.freeforums.org/ New Dungeon Crawl forum!]
* 24th July 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/tourney-time-again The tournament is a week away!]
* 24th July 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/stone-soup-0-7-0-pacific-pachyderm Stone Soup 0.7.0 is finished, with elephants!]
* 21st July 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/rc3-for-0-7-0 A third release candidate for 0.7 is out.]
* 18th July 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/second-release-candidate-for-0-7-0 A second release candidate for version 0.7 is out, squashing many bugs.]
* 15th July 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/first-release-candidate-for-0-7-0 0.7's first Release Candidate is here!]
* 13th June 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-6-1 Stone Soup 0.6.1] was released.
* 9th June 2010 - [http://www.mediafire.com/?zmyzge3o2wd NetTiles (Windows)] - Play online with the tiles interface! Credit goes to Gorilla Codpiece for the link.
* 7th May 2010 - Luca Barbieri has announced '''NetTiles''', a branch of 0.6 tiles that allows for play on [[CAO]]. Check out [http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?thread_name=q2rff13bc9a1005080027n8ce47dfdw1b532430464ccbfe%40mail.gmail.com&forum_name=crawl-ref-discuss this thread] on crawl-ref-discuss.
* 27th March 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/stone-soup-0-6-0-heizolruckstosabdampfung Stone Soup 0.6.0 has been released!]
* 17th March 2010 - The second release candidate of 0.6 is out. Windows version can be downloaded [https://crawl.develz.org/trunk/ here] and the Mac tiles version can be downloaded [https://crawl.develz.org/trunk/crawl_tiles_osx-0.6.0-rc3.zip here].
* 15th March 2010 - 0.6's release was delayed due to various bugs that needed to be fixed.
* 3rd March 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/dungeon-sprint-fast-and-furious Dungeon Sprint], a single, fixed level of Dungeon Crawl that is similar to the Tomb of Horrors, is available to play online at crawl.develz.org!
* 1st March 2010 - The released date of 0.6 has been changed to March 15th.
* 24th February 2010 - The 0.6 release is close! The pre-release of 0.6 can be downloaded [http://crawl.develz.org/trunk/ here].
* 3rd February 2010 - 0.6's release date is March 1st! We are keeping track of the changes and you can read them [[0.6.0|here]]!
* 15th January 2010 - Henzell & Gretell can now be accessed [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?page_id=214 here]
* 10th January 2010 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=210 Playtesting: New changes]
* 1st January 2010 - Happy New Year! A new version of the [http://crawl.develz.org/trunk trunk build] is out.
===2009===
* 25th November 2009 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=116 Playtesting – How you can help!]
* 15th October 2009 - ''Crawl'' switched to [http://git-scm.com/ git]
* 13th October 2009 - [[CAO]] upgraded to 0.5.2
* 9th October 2009 - ''Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup'' [http://crawl-ref.sourceforge.net/ 0.5.2] is released!
* 19th September 2009 - The [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/poll_results.txt poll results] are now available.
* 18th September 2009 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=50 Happy Birthday, Stone Soup!]
* 2nd September 2009 - The [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney09/overview.html tournament] is over! Read the detailed writeup [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney-09-writeup.txt here].
* 21th August 2009 - The [[devteam]] would love it if you emailed them answers to this [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/poll.txt poll].
* 30th July 2009 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=79 Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.5.1 released!]
* 28th July 2009 - [[CAO]] '09 tournament is almost upon us! Read about the awards you can win behind [http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney09/ this link].
* 16th June 2009 - You can now follow [[CAO]] as [http://twitter.com/crawlakrasiac/ @crawlakrasiac] on Twitter, if you are so inclined.
* 10th April 2009 - 0.1 version of [https://sites.google.com/site/crawlvariations/Home Zot Defense] now playable.
* 12th June 2009 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=46 Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.5 released!]
===2008===
* 15th July 2008 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=37 Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.4 released!]
* 2nd April 2008 - [https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=33 Windows binaries of latest trunk available for ''Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup v0.4.'']
